title: Peasants Fighting in a Tavern
medium: pen and dark brown ink over graphite (by Ostade) and pen and light brown ink with gray-brown wash (by Dusart) on laid paper
attribution: Adriaen van Ostade and Cornelis Dusart
creditline: Gift of Edward William Carter and Hannah Locke Carter, in Honor of the 50th Anniversary of the National Gallery of Art
